meanings.definition: A person who is enthusiastic about new technology.
meanings.sent1: As a technophile, Sarah always has the latest gadgets.
meanings.sent2: The technophile spent hours researching the newest smartphones.
meanings.sent3: The technophile's excitement over the new computer was contagious.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a technophile spread throughout the office.
meanings.sent5: Being a technophile means always being on the cutting edge of innovation.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a person who is passionate about technology.
meanings.sent1: The technophile community eagerly awaited the release of the new gaming console.
meanings.sent2: Her technophile friends were always the first to try out new software.
meanings.sent3: The technophile cat knocked over the laptop in its curiosity.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a technophile dream, with neon lights and digital billboards.
meanings.sent5: The technophile design of the building incorporated state-of-the-art materials.
